text:
Local Government Order (No. 2) 2014

I make the following order under section 137(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

13 January 2014

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order (No. 2) 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Clarence City Council
    The land situated at 60 Belbins Road, Lindisfarne in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 214768, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Clarence City Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 February 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
